content.rendered:
Professional Home Care & Support Services

Welcome to T L Care – big enough to cope but small enough to care

Friendly and Reliable Homecare Services in West Wirral

We offer you, or your family member, the highest quality care and support with
daily activities and personal needs in the comfort and privacy of your own home

If you have any questions, please contact us today.

About Us

We are a small, independent care company established in 2002, based in Hoylake and cover most of West Wirral.

More Information

Our Care Services

Let us help you, or your family member, remain safe and independent in your own home for as long as possible.

More Information

Join Our team

Would you like a rewarding job with flexible hours where you brighten the day for the people you visit?

More Information

Testimonials

Jack C

“Excellent team and I couldn’t fault them in any way. All of my needs are met, and I’m treated as a person rather than what people see. The management team are really friendly. I’ve found carers for life.”

Susan S

“The carers and management are excellent in responding to the needs of the person, and provide updates as and when necessary. They are proactive in offering further assistance if this is required, also without prompting.”

Julie D

“My sister has been cared for by TL Care in an assisted living house for 8-years. She has flourished in them 8-years due to the excellent care they provide, but mainly because of the family environment that they create from their loving carers. They have given me peace of mind knowing that my sister is safe, loved and well cared for! Thank you, TL Care, for everything you do!”

Fully Trained Staff

Our homecare staff are here to assist you with your individual needs,
everyday tasks and bring you a smile!

Call us today on 0151 632 4065

Send Us A Message
